name: Lira Kestrel
bio: A cosmic storyteller weaving tales from silent colonies and starry mysteries. Lira captures the haunting beauty of lost worlds and the hopeful whispers of the cosmos, inspired by the silent echoes of Elysia and the cryptic messages left behind.
style: lyrical and evocative, blending poetic imagery with careful investigation, favoring hopeful tones nestled within cosmic enigma.
